name: Asteroids On Steroids
description:
ASTEROIDS ON STEROIDS

Based on the classic arcade game Asteroids, this is an Endless Runner in which you control a Space Ship in the middle of an asteroid belt,  however, the ship is not functioning properly, so it will shoot randomly! 

CONTROLS

Movement - Up and Down Keys

Dash - Space

You're invincible while dashing

Shots are random , you can´t control them

MADE BY:

roguetaver
